metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22253 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Improper authorization in GitLab EE affecting all versions since 13.4allowed a user who previously had the necessary access to triggerdeployments to protected environments under specific conditions after theaccess has been removed

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
